name.description: The name of this DC/OS service.

cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to this instance.

mem.description: Memory to allocate to this instance.

bridge.description: Whether to use BRIDGE networking mode for Docker container. By default, this is false and HOST mode networking is used.

ssl_cert.description: Whether to use SSL Certificate. If selected it will fetch SSL Certificate and Key from Provided URL

enabled.description: If enabled then it will use provided URL to download SSL Certificate and Key

ssl_key_path.description: The full path of the key file on the web server.

ssl_cert_path.description: The full path of the certificate file on the web server.

name.description: The DC/OS service name of the Artifactory server to route requests to.

user.description: Username to use when fetching reverse proxy configuration from Artifactory.

password.description: Password to use when fetching reverse proxy configuration from Artifactory.
